page.title: 02WHY PEOPLE LIVE HERE.
page.content: Why do people live in this area?When we asked this question people replied that their work was close,they liked the countryside,it was close to a town or that they had been born here. They enjoyed the countryside for its peace and quiet,the fresh air,the hills and lovely scenery. They liked the natural life surrounding the village,the friendly people and the good communications within easy reach.Their dislikes were the poor public transport,the lack of facilities such as shops,doctors,dentists,libraries and little for young people to do.Some people disliked the crop spraying in the vicinity, the traffic,new buildings,the horses on the road and the expense of travel.
